info.name: Top Leader API
info.description: Complete API collection for Top Leader platform

request.description: Form-based login. Returns 204 on success with session cookie.
Validates current authentication status. Returns 204 if authenticated.
Send password reset email. No authentication required.
Set new password using reset token from email.
Set user's preferred locale (en, cs, fr, de)
Get upcoming sessions for coach (requires COACH role)
Get own coach profile (requires COACH role)

body.raw:
{
  "publicProfile": true,
  "firstName": "John",
  "lastName": "Coach",
  "email": "coach@example.com",
  "webLink": "https://mycoaching.com",
  "bio": "Experienced executive coach with 15+ years in leadership development.",
  "languages": ["English", "Czech"],
  "fields": ["Leadership", "Executive Coaching", "Team Development"],
  "experienceSince": "2010-01-01",
  "rate": "150",
  "rateOrder": 1,
  "internalRate": 120,
  "linkedinProfile": "https://linkedin.com/in/johncoach",
  "freeSlots": true,
  "priority": 10,
  "primaryRoles": ["COACH"],
  "certificate": ["PCC", "ICF"],
  "baseLocations": ["Prague", "Vienna"],
  "travelWillingness": "EU",
  "deliveryFormat": ["online", "in-person"],
  "serviceType": ["individual", "group"],
  "topics": ["leadership", "communication", "conflict-resolution"],
  "diagnosticTools": ["DISC", "MBTI"],
  "industryExperience": ["IT", "Finance", "Healthcare"],
  "references": "Available upon request",
  "timeZone": "Europe/Prague"
}

request.description: Requires ADMIN role. Supports filtering by username, firstName, lastName, status, companyId, etc.
Top up user credits from requested amount
Internal job endpoint - requires JOB role with HTTP Basic Auth
